attributes.action: Ensure current requirements for the wearing of face coverings remain in place
attributes.additional_details: Face coverings protect those around the wearer. Making the wearing of face coverings discretionary is therefore meaningless and puts those at greatest risk of infection in danger. The UK Parliament must lead by example.
attributes.background: Parliament should ensure the legal requirement to wear face coverings in certain places in England remains in place until such time as it is safe for it to be lifted.

rejection.details:
Keep face covering mandatory in indoor public settings beyond 19th July 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590616
 
Keep face masks mandatory for public transport after the lifting of restrictions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590694
